column5: CC and I hit one of our favorite tribs this week and fished from top to bottom. Finicky fish indeed. The super long walk paid off with fish hitting purple then pink worms not to mention some cured salmon roe. Hope the legs are ok CC. Good times indeed.
Beauty chrome!!!  Congrats you guys  Leechman
Cool shot.  A little hike in the spring helps shed a few winter pounds, we should have all joined yas.
always gratifying when the hard work pays off, nice fish!

WAS A GREAT OUTING INDEED BRO. WE DID HIT ONE OF MY FAV TRIBS BUT WE WENT TO WATERS IVE NEVER BEEN ON BEFORE. LOTS AND LOTS OF WALKING AND LOTS AND LOTS OF CASTS BUT ID DID PAY OFF. NOT GREAT NUMBER BUT THE BEST FIGHTING STEELHEAD IVE EVER FOUGHT IN 20YRS. WATERS STILL PRETTY DARN COLD. STRANGE YR AS WELL . ALWAYS FISH AROUND BUT NOT LIKE PAST YRS. THEY SEEM TO HAVE DONE THERE BIZ AND BOOKED OUT IN THE NICE HIGH WATERS THIS YR. GOOD NEWS FOR THE FISHERY FOR ONCE. WAS AN AWESOME TIME BRO . ALL I GOTTA SAY IS THANK GOD I HAD 2 PERKS LEFT OVER FROM THAT HIKE  LOL NEXT WEEK LETS TRY AGAIN.
Nice guys!   Def motivation to keep the trout rod out just a little longer.
Nice colours on that one!  thanks for posting!
